result.name: exportability-database
result.notes: Database recording details of claims for Carers Allowance for people moving or living abroad to an EU country, arriving from an EU country or in receipt of a pension from an EU country. The information includes Name, National Insurance Number and information relating to the claim

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Exportability Database

extras.value: https://www.gov.uk/carers-allowance    Not due to be released. Contains personal and sensitive data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
